definition: pipit (genus Anthus)
the sound of the wind/to soar
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
variant of 屌[diao3]/penis
(bird species of China) Pechora pipit (Anthus gustavi)
(bird species of China) upland pipit (Anthus sylvanus)
(bird species of China) Blyth's pipit (Anthus godlewskii)
(bird species of China) tawny pipit (Anthus campestris)
(bird species of China) tree pipit (Anthus trivialis)
(bird species of China) maroon-backed accentor (Prunella immaculata)
(bird species of China) Siberian accentor (Prunella montanella)
(bird species of China) rufous-breasted accentor (Prunella strophiata)
(bird species of China) olive-backed pipit (Anthus hodgsoni)
(bird species of China) water pipit (Anthus spinoletta)
(bird species of China) Richard's pipit (Anthus richardi)
(bird species of China) paddyfield pipit (Anthus rufulus)
(bird species of China) rosy pipit (Anthus roseatus)
(bird species of China) red-throated pipit (Anthus cervinus)
(bird species of China) meadow pipit (Anthus pratensis)

sentences.english: Rosy pipits seem to have broad and long supercilium in non-breeding plumage.
sentences.chinese: 粉紅胸鷚似乎在非繁殖羽時有粗而長的眉線。

sentences.english: I just searched some photos of Rosy pipits.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛搜尋了一些粉紅胸鷚的照片。

sentences.english: Honestly speaking, I did not consider Rosy pipit.
sentences.chinese: 其實我並沒有想到粉紅胸鷚。

sentences.english: A meadowlark of eastern north america.
